title: Did not let me ban
body: So after a 9 minute wait finally get a game started, get through pick intent but then... I can't ban, the ban button's gone and double clicking stuff does nothing... I get a leave for it? WTHackMountain?

replies.body:
This can happen for a few reasons, either bad game files or even an unstable connection causing you to lose sync.  Sorry that happened, though.  :/  Just to be safe, run a repair through the client settings to make sure your game files are healthy.

Test it in a custom game!  Should the issue persists, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to make sure your network to champion select is holding steady.  I hope that helps!
